title: Low inventory for SKU‑B23 in Warehouse A
suggestedAction: Reorder 300 units immediately; target lead time is 5 days.

title: 30‑day late shipment rate rose above 4% for regional vendor EU‑PS1
suggestedAction: Reach out to vendor; expedite outstanding orders and confirm shipment timestamps.

title: Spike in refund requests for product XYZ during June sale
suggestedAction: Audit refund reasons and contact customer service to check for product defects.

title: Cart abandon rate jumped 20% during quick‑checkout A/B test
suggestedAction: Pause experiment and run qualitative user testing on checkout flow.

title: Price mismatch detected: product C123 listed lower on Channel Z
suggestedAction: Match Channel Z price to channel average to prevent arbitrage complaints.

title: Back‑in‑stock signal for SKU‑D56 with notification opt‑ins
suggestedAction: Notify wish‑listed users and consider running a micro‑sms campaign.

title: Search ranking for "eco‑sneakers" dropped below page 2
suggestedAction: Review content meta tags and increase high‑intent backlinks.

title: Orders failed sync: Channel API timeout on 2025‑08‑03
suggestedAction: Alert devops; retry batch sync with exponential back‑off.

title: Competitor listing for SKU‑A12 undercut price by 15%
suggestedAction: Launch price match campaign or highlight unique bundle promotions.

title: Inbound stock audit mismatch > 10% for perishable item F‑900
suggestedAction: Investigate receiving dock; re‑count and adjust system inventory.
